name: RETAIL INDUSTRY LEADERS ASSOCIATION (RILA)
description: Association representing retail, consumer products companies & service suppliers
sampleDescriptions: Issues and policies related to the retail workforce.

Issues related to comprehensive tax reform.  Issues relating to the treatment of sales tax collection for online purchases, including S.976, The Marketplace Fairness Act of 2017 and H. R. 2193, The Re
Issues related to the Internet of Things, privacy, data security, data breach notification, cybersecurity and retail innovation.  Issues related to payments and routing including the Durbin amendment
Issues related to privacy, data security, data breach notification and cybersecurity.  Issues related to payments and routing including the Durbin amendment and the Financial CHOICE Act.
Issues related to international trade and customs, including the Miscellaneous Tariff Bill (MTB) and Generalized System of Preferences (GSP).
